text.config.repacked-client.title: Repacked Client Config
text.config.repacked-client.option.overr:
Override the default minecraft resource pack reload screen
 with a background process that runs asynchronously
text.config.repacked-client.option.reRen:
If repacked should re-render the world after a resource pack reload
This is HIGHLY recommended to be enabled unless you know what you are doing
text.config.repacked-client.option.disab:
If repacked should disable all your currently enabled packs
 when you join a world/server that you have setup a profile for,
 before enabling the chosen packs for that profile
